snippet: Also, guides for Android users and news from Facebook, including a reminder that a new privacy policy goes into effect Jan. 30.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on how to block e-mail messages from certain senders in Mac OS X, and whether there is a general primer on using the Android operating system; Tip of the Week notes how to navigate settings in Facebook's news feed.
lead_paragraph: Also, guides for Android users and news from Facebook, including a reminder that a new privacy policy goes into effect Jan. 30.
